author: Patrice Gaines
title: For black parishioners, a new normal: Church extends beyond a building
description: The coronavirus outbreak is forcing black churches and funeral directors to rely more on technology than ever before.
content: Throughout the black community, from Selma to Sacramento, funeral home directors are explaining to grieving families that social distancing means no public viewings, a small graveside service, no limos and, as hard as it may be, no hugging, kissing and shakin… [+6732 chars]
